item.title: Hive metastore service
item.description: We can simplify the Hive architecture to four components: The runtime contains the logic of the query engine that translates the SQL - esque Hive Query Language (HQL) into MapReduce jobs that run over files stored in the filesystem. Storage component is simply that, it stores file in various formats and index structures to recall these files (JSON, CSV, ORC, Parquet, HDFS, Aws S3, GCS)
